title: Children of other lands: Scandinavia
creator_credit: Post Pictures Corporation and Clyde E. Elliott
brief_description: Documentary on the children of Norway, Sweden and Lapland, their social life and traditions compared to those of the United States. Suitable for lower and middle primary school levels.
